body:
As an avid member on the forums, I feel I should create a thread wondering what games or spotlights you want to see on the forums. My main focus is to boost the player count on this platform and I'm willing to host certain things you guys may not be comfortable with. Write down below what you are looking for and I will possibly pick a few and decide to start them, cheers!




List:
body_tagged:

List:
title: What do you want to see on the forums?

replies.body: Couldn't people make posts they want to see on their own xD?
replies.body_tagged: Couldn't people make posts they want to see on their own xD?

replies.body:
What I don't want to see: (did the opposite of what the post said but oh weLL)

- Several different "Meet the Player" posts
(nothing against the players making them I just do not see the point in making several different posts. Maybe just make one big post & have every type of meet the member in there)

- Staff posts
[Unless it is informational, tournaments & such]
 (saying this because the past few days looking at the front page I see 20 posts just made by staff. I understand we have to be interactive & active on the forums but making countless posts that aren't necessarily needed can get a tad bit overwhelming I guess you could say.)

- AMA posts on front page. 
(LFM'S & LFT's  were removed & they are hardly every bumped / made. There is at least 4 AMA posts every day on the front page.)


X R A N T (SORTA) O V E R X

X R A N T (SORTA) O V E R X

replies.body:
Also, I just don't quite understand this thread in general, you may have to explain some things to me.

I'm willing to host certain things you guys may not be comfortable with
I don't understand what that means, what do you mean by ''hosting' things we may not be comfortable with'?

and I will possibly pick a few and decide to start them
So, you collect all this feedback and make it a reality I assume?
How do you intend on doing this though?
And why will you only 'possibly' pick a few ideas and ignore the rest?

Also, will you be the only person working on rejuvenating the forums?
Is this a staff team effort?
Is this a combined effort from the staff and the community?

And why will you only 'possibly' pick a few ideas and ignore the rest?

Also, will you be the only person working on rejuvenating the forums?
Is this a staff team effort?
Is this a combined effort from the staff and the community?

replies.body:
1. Some players say, may want a certain forum game. But they don't want to personally run it. Therefore I proceed to take their idea, credit them & run it by myself. Therefore we have a good idea actually happening.

I'm not looking for feedback, I'm looking for ideas, the ones I won't use are either trolls or I already have too many.

This is personally an effort by myself but I hope to encourage the staff team & community to help me increase the player count on this platform and being the forums alive.

replies.body: I think what the forum lacks is content. I don't think adding random forum games can fill this lack of content however.
replies.body_tagged: I think what the forum lacks is content. I don't think adding random forum games can fill this lack of content however.

replies.body:
Discussions on various topics such as politics, conflicts, the Internet, etc. 

Threads that will encourage long ass well written posts with multiple people.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: About the "Meet the Player"i want to say that i started the Meet the Beaner threads because i don't like how DaBader and Arigen do their interviews, always the same questions, and i try to change a few questions to don't get bored the players.
